entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
